attributes.action: ensure that no taxpayers money is used to pay Parliamentary Whips or assisitant Whips.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If MPs spend time and effort as Whips who are nothing more than Shop Stewards and Enforcers for Political parties then the Parties they act for should stand the cost not taxpayers.

The Whips are a major part of the ongoing problems in Parliament and their activities are harming democracy.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/ or the political parties concerned.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
